techmeme.title: Taboola's CEO says the company has struck a deal with Apple to power native advertising within the Apple News and Apple Stocks apps; TBLA stock jumps 9%+ (Sara Fischer/Axios)
Sources: Marc Andreessen and Ben Horowitz have told a16z staff in recent days that they plan to make large donations to PACs supporting Donald Trump's campaign (The Information)
Vectara, which offers AI "grounded search", or Retrieval Augmented Generation, tools to enterprise, raised a $25M Series A, following a $28.5M seed in 2023 (Sean Michael Kerner/VentureBeat)
The UK CMA opens a formal investigation into Microsoft's Inflection AI investment, and sets a September 11 deadline on whether to open an in-depth investigation (Katharine Gemmell/Bloomberg)
After Trump was shot, Elon Musk backed his bid and made 100+ posts stepping up his political speech, entering uncharted territory for a social media leader (New York Times)
